attributes.action: rescind the decision to bestow an honorary Knighthood on Senator Edward Kennedy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Senator Kennedy is on record as having described Irish Republican terrorists as "freedom fighters" during The Troubles. Indeed, he is widely believed to have given financial support to their "cause". In view of the resurgence of terrorist atrocities by Republicans in Northern Ireland, rewarding him with an honorary Knighthood is an outrage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
